function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Unequal access to daylight, nature, and thermal comfort due to socioeconomic status","Impact":"Increased risk of disease, disorder, injury, and mortality for individuals with lower socioeconomic status","Mitigation":"Implement equal access to healthy living conditions in all living environments","Technologies":"Passive design strategies, natural ventilation, and operable windows","People":"Individuals with low socioeconomic status","Owner":"Government and policymakers"},{"Description":"High CO2 levels, mold, and poor indoor air quality in social housing","Impact":"Increased risk of respiratory problems, allergies, and chronic diseases","Mitigation":"Implement standards for healthy indoor air quality in housing, reduce CO2 levels, and address mold issues","Technologies":"Improved ventilation systems, air quality monitoring, and mold remediation","People":"Residents of social housing","Owner":"Housing authorities and building managers"},{"Description":"Outbreak of COVID-19 in a high-rise apartment building due to unknown cause","Impact":"Spread of contagious disease within the building leading to illness and potential fatalities","Mitigation":"Investigate and address the cause of the outbreak, improve building ventilation systems","Technologies":"Advanced air purification systems, building ventilation inspection and maintenance","People":"Residents of high-rise apartment buildings","Owner":"Building management and health authorities"}]}
